allPosts.title: Hello world!
allPosts.excerpt: A small introduction to the blog
allPosts.content:
After many, many years, I decided it was a good time to start writing again!

I spent a few afternoons getting this Next.js blog up and ready. I'll write a bit more about it in the upcoming days.

Wanted to write this brief introduction to get this online and just saying hi the the wild internet. See you around ðŸ‘‹
